TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed DayOfWeek extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the day of the week.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DayOfWeek enumeration represents the day of the week in calendars that have seven days per week. The value of the constants in this enumeration ranges from F:System.DayOfWeek.Sunday?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True to F:System.DayOfWeek.Saturday?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True. If cast to an integer, its value ranges from zero (which indicates F:System.DayOfWeek.Sunday?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True) to six (which indicates F:System.DayOfWeek.Saturday?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True).
This enumeration is useful when it is desirable to have a strongly typed specification of the day of the week. For example, this enumeration is the type of the property value for the P:System.DateTime.DayOfWeek?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True property.
The members of the DayOfWeek enumeration are not localized. To return the localized name of the day of the week, call the M:System.DateTime.ToString(System.String)?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False or the M:System.DateTime.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False method with either the "ddd" or "dddd" format strings. The former format string produces the abbreviated weekday name; the latter produces the full weekday name.
## Examples The following example demonstrates the P:System.DateTime.DayOfWeek?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True property and the DayOfWeek enumeration.
[!CODE [DateTime.DayOfWeek#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.DayOfWeek#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DayOfWeek Friday = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DayOfWeek Monday = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DayOfWeek Saturday = int32(6)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DayOfWeek Sunday = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DayOfWeek Thursday = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DayOfWeek Tuesday = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DayOfWeek Wednesday = int32(3)
